refnamediv.refpurpose: Eliminates unused space in a BRL-CAD database file.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Eliminates unused space in a BRL-CAD database file.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the garbage_collect command to delete unused space in a BRL-CAD database file.

example.title: Delete unused space in a BRL-CAD database file.

listitem.para: Cleans out unused space in the database.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
